settings.title: WHAT DOES BEAN TO BAR MEAN?
settings.content: The term “Bean-To-Bar” largely refers to the indication of one brand controlling the entire process for the purchase of the beans, and all the way to the creation of the final product. “Craft Chocolate” is a term also used to express the premium quality of the cacao beans that are being sourced & used for chocolate making.

custom_css: .h2 {font-family: "Fjalla One"; font-size: 40px; font-weight: 400; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #3b2d22; opacity: 0.6; text-transform: uppercase;}

settings.title: WHY IS THIS SO IMPORTANT?
settings.content: In tandem with our master chocolatier, we set out to create the most exquisite chocolate using the finest cacao available. Our entire line of chocolate bars are handcrafted locally (Delray Beach, Florida) in small batches which allows us to both preserve the highest possible quality & extract uniquely delicious flavors from our cacao.

custom_css: .h2 {font-family: "Fjalla One"; font-size: 40px; font-weight: 400; margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 20px; color: #3b2d22; opacity: 0.6; text-transform: uppercase;}

settings.title: HOW ARE WE INNOVATING WITHIN CRAFT CHOCOLATE?
settings.content: Creativity is thinking up new things, Innovation is doing new things”(Theodore Levitt). Innovating within such a unique space as craft chocolate meant we’d have to come up with nothing short of a masterpiece formula in order to satisfy our benchmark for true innovation. Cacao + Dates and nothing else: Zero preservatives, added refined sugars, sugar alcohols, GMOs or dairy. By taking two superfoods and creating a blend that is both super delicious as well as stacked with only “good-for-you” ingredients, we’re beyond excited to invite you all to open the door to a new & exciting world of chocolate.
